Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 112 not out, the highest score by an Indian batsman in a T20I
India won by 91 runs, their largest victory margin in T20Is against Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was named the Player of the Match and the Player of the Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium in Rajkot
